login.title: Seems like you have not logged in or your seesion has expired, please log in... 🍟
login.stringErr: Sorry, you can't send an empty string
login.invalid:
Whops... Looks like your credentials are not valid.
Try executing: {command} to try again!

credentials.failed: It was impossible to save credentials due to an unexpected error...

tweet.confirm: Are you sure of the tweet:
tweet.success: Your tweet has been succesfully published, you can look it on: {user}'account
